EmailTemplate.name: LMS Due Date Reminder Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Library Item({!Library_Issue_Ret_Item__c.Library_Item_Name__c}) Due Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi, {!Library_Issue_Ret_Item__c.Library_Item_Name__c} is due to be returned on {!Library_Issue_Ret_Item__c.Expected_Return_Date__c}},Please return to avoid any late fees
Regards LMS Team
